transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, sir aapse PMO baat kar raha hu sir, mai keh raha hu baat ho gayi aapki manager se?
Executive: Haan, ho gayi sir.
Customer: Theek hai, maine jaise baat ho gayi.
Customer: Haan, toh sir vahi hai aapka refund ke liye unhone bata diya hoga ki.
Executive: Jo bhi service use hui hai aapki utne din ka katega. Baki jo bhi hoga aapka refund ke liye.
Customer: Haan. Toh tab tak toh chalu rahega na aisa bolta hu.
Executive: Haan, jab tak agar close nahi hogi hamare yaha se tab tak chalu rahega.
Customer: Aisa refund nahi aayenge tab tak toh chalu rahega hai na?
Executive: Haan tab tak chalu rahega bilkul bilkul. Haan aur inquiry bhi chalu rahegi na sir?
Executive: Haan tab tak rahegi sir. Inquiry toh lifetime rahegi na woh?
Executive: Inquiry lifetime kaise rahegi sir woh toh aapke baat hui hogi na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Free mein jitni inquiry agar aati hogi toh aayenge free mein inquiry ki guarantee kaun dete hai hum.
Customer: Hmm. Aisa hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap yeh aa jayega aapke bank mein dekhiye 10-15 din lagenge. Abhi fir mai aapke isko ticket close kar deta hu uske baad hum log initiate refund initiate kar dete hai aapke, theek hai?
Customer: Haan haan.
Customer: Koi baat nahi kara do refund, theek hai?
Executive: Haan mai isko ticket close kar raha hu aap isko dekh lijiyega theek hai aapke paas close ka section mein woh aayega aapko dekh lijiyega theek hai sir.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about the refund status.

- Customer asked about the inquiry validity.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund will be initiated.

- Executive confirmed account will be active till refund.

- Executive clarified inquiry validity is not lifetime.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, inquiry, subscription
